## mmm add

Downloads and adds mods to your dependency file by slug or ID

```
mmm add {id | slug}... [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for add
```

### Options inherited from parent commands

```
  -C, --cwd string   changes the working directory
```
